authors.headline: Opportunity Evaluation & Commercial Delivery Manager, Decarbonization & Emerging Markets
Front End Development Manager at Shell

courses.name: Lean Six Sigma: Green Belt; Shell
Project management: Essentials of realizing opportunities (ERO);Shell

profile_positions.description:
- Conduct financial evaluations of decarbonization opportunities, including renewable energy projects, energy efficiency initiatives, and carbon offset programs.
- Develop financial models to assess the economic viability, return on investment, and payback period of decarbonization initiatives.
-Analyze financial risks and conduct sensitivity analysis and scenario modeling to identify potential vulnerabilities and mitigation strategies.
-Coordination of end-to-end process of running investable case framings for potential investment opportunities, including market analysis, financial modeling, and investment evaluation.
-Lead thorough market research and analysis to identify emerging trends, market dynamics, and growth opportunities in the renewable energy sector
-Value chain mapping and assessment of strengths and vulnerabilities 
-Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather data, evaluate project costs, and assess financial impacts.
profile_positions.title: Opportunity Evaluation Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Business Plan custodian and focal point of business plan submission to Shell Upstream Group
•	Trusted advisor/partner to Shell Upstream Leadership team (LC), providing strategic advice and consulting on the most critical issues facing the business
•	Contribute to best- in-class processes and solutions and lead projects intended to optimize operational efficiency and improve quality
•	Creating unified reporting model and lead decision management within organization, identifying critical metrics and help create a discipline of monitoring
•	Contribute towards developing the Business Planning agenda for the company
•	Directing the development and execution of financial plans, focusing on underlying business drivers by modeling and quantifying the potential effects of changes in business drivers
•	Focal point in the development and measurement of business annual budget planning activities
•	Assess and monitor progress against the business plan and develop recommendations to strengthen the impact of the Business Planning agenda
•	Develops new performance measures and internal benchmarks for an information framework to support process analysis and re-engineering activities
•	Contribution to Executive Asset management plan and assessment of gap to potential
profile_positions.title: Senior Busines & Strategy Planner

profile_positions.description:
•	Building and managing high performing integrated technical teams that collaboratively work well with each other as well as other teams (e.g. finance, business analysts, project management)
•	Leading Development Team through the Agile Development Process
•	Project delivery through different stages of project maturation: Assess-Select-Define
•	Developing project plans to address tactical objectives. Partnering with business unit managers in identifying opportunities to improve
•	Identify and monitor project and process risks within full TECOP scope of project management and establish risk mitigation and contingency plans
•	Developing strategy and plans for piloting new technologies, tools, ways of working, process improvements
•	Provide technical & project leadership across the organization, from strategic decision making to project planning and execution
profile_positions.title: Squad Lead /Project Lead -North Sea Decommissioning

profile_positions.description:
-Discipline: Petrophysical support to Development, Exploration, WRFM and Abandondonment
- Project management : Opportunity lead for various development project,delivery gates-DG1-2(Identify, Assess)
-Lean practitioner: certified Lean Six Sigma Green belt 
- Shell global roles: associate Subject Matter Expert in Abondonment, support to various projects worldwide
profile_positions.title: Development & WRFM Petrophysicist, Lean Practitioner, aSME Abandonment& RFP CFE

profile_positions.description:
•	Advanced petrophysical interpretation and data processing such tools as NMR, Spectrometry, Acoustic
•	QA/QC of Formation Tester tools
•	Advanced skills in Techlog.
profile_positions.title: Petrophysicist

profile_positions.description:
•	Petrophysical interpretation and analysis.
•	Image interpretation and structural analysis.
•	Technical client support.
•	Assistance to business development and geosteering team, field support.
profile_positions.title: Senior Petrophysicist/ Tech. Prof. Log Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Formation evaluation using LWD data.
• QC of LWD data, field support.
• Geosteering of horizontal wells (software StrataSteer 3D and MultiWell).
• Construction of geological models, petrophysical models of the fields.
• Monitoring the drilling of horizontal wells in real time.
profile_positions.title: Acting Tech. Prof. Log Analyst,M/LWD

profile_positions.description:
•	 Leading MWD/LWD jobs.
•	 Log interpretation, quality control and lithology analysis.
•	 Operational support during drilling, online coordination and correction of well profiles.
•	 Experience in Directional Drilling (BHA, tendency, hydraulic calculation, slide and rotary drilling).
profile_positions.title: M/LWD engineer, Log Analyst
